text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Clipper Mills |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = census-designated place |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_map = File:Butte County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Clipper Mills Highlighted 0614148.svg |map_caption = Location of Clipper Mills in Butte County, California |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California | population_total = 160 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = |population_density_sq_mi = auto | population_density_km2 = auto | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 1.74 | area_land_sq_mi = 1.74 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 | area_total_km2 = 4.50 | area_land_km2 = 4.50 | area_water_km2 = 0.00 | area_water_percent = 0 | area_note = |timezone = Pacific (PST) |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Butte County |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = | |established_title = |established_date = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 1082 |elevation_ft = 3550 |postal_code_type = ZIP Code |postal_code = 95930 |area_code = 530 |blank_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank_info = 1655908; 2612476 |website = |footnotes = ; }} Clipper Mills (also known as Clipper Mill) is a census-designated place (CDP) in Butte County, California. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Butte County, California
title: Clipper Mills, California
